releaseNotes:
- Introduced Top, Trending, and Latest JioSaavn online playlists.

- Redesigned the Artist screen and added Party Mode with Save to Library support.

- Team Netra

changelog.text: Added Top, Trending, and Latest JioSaavn online playlists.
Resolved overwrite issues in Google Drive backup and restore.
Introduced full online playlist import with duplicate handling and local library saving.
Redesigned Artist screen and added Party Mode with Save to Library support.

lockMessage: The app is temporarily locked for maintenance. Please check back later.
